data.description: Orientation to the UniverCity Year program and  underlying theory and applied knowledge around community engagement, the function of local governments, and working with local officials and professional staff. Gain core competencies for applied, community-based learning projects and the importance of place-based learning.  Includes multidisciplinary approaches to problem-solving, access and use of information resources, reflection and action on ethical and professional issues,  consideration of  social and systemic roots of issues faced by local municipalities, and preparing written reports.
data.title: UNIVERCITY YEAR GUIDED EXPERIENCE
